name: Mandy Moodispaugh
text: Staff was lovely and the food was great. Was the first time my kids got to try Blaze pizza so they were stoked and this trip didn't disappoint. All of the ingredients were stocked well and the stations were all tidy. We even complicated the ‚Ä¶More

name: Allan Hart
text:
Fun place to go. There's a wait around the usual dinner and lunch times. If you're on limited time, order and pay online!
Quite a few choices for your pizza. My wife is vegan and enjoys the options.

name: crystal spaletta
text: Pizza was delish! I've been a few times & found my perfect blend. Young employees looked tired (10pm) and a little messy.

name: Joni Brewer
text: $,60.00 later, our pizza's had very little tidbits of items we ordered on them. We love Blaze pizza and were trying to help our local blaze pizza stay afloat.  Our delivery person was amazing.  But we probably won't be using the delivery service again.

name: eric guisinger
text: A different kind of pizza place. Thin crispy crust, quickly assembled and cooked. Great fresh ingredients-love the pesto garlic sauce and a hint of gorgonzola cheese. Toppings aplenty. Great Vegan choices, even vegan cheese! And gluten free options too. Great parking and fair prices with friendly, competent staff.

name: Ronnie Fredrickson
text: Blaze has always been one of my favorites!

name: Nelly Navarrete-Valle
text: Wonderful pizza place with clean and welcoming atmosphere. Staff are quick to welcome customers and work on an order. Pizzas are made quick and efficient and not once did I get a burnt pizza. I'd definitely return for another. :P

name: D Jorgenson
text: As others have noted, their customer service and quality control is a concern. In the last month, we have had two online order errors (wrong toppings, no cheese or sauce) and an inedible burnt pizza. After speaking with ‚Äúmanagement‚Äù and ‚Ä¶More

name: Sonia Ramrakhiani
text: Blaze is always good idea. I always get the build your own pizza and basically create a salad on top of my pizza. The staff at this location can get overwhelmed on a busy night but usually they are super patient with me as I go around adding every vegetarian topping possible üòä

name: Virtually Rick
text: My pizza was delicious and surprisingly had a generous portion of ingredients.  It had one of the highest quality sourced ingredients of any restaurant I have ever been to.  By ordering online, I cut to the front of the in-store line.  My ‚Ä¶More

name: Deb Maxwell
text: Big kudos to Denise!!! I went in today with a question and a small concern. She promptly, professionally and with a smile took care of both and went above and beyond typical customer service. I felt honored and important as a Blaze Pizza patron and will most definitely be back!!  Thank you again Denise for making my day!!

name: Constanza Lombardi
text: Wrong hours on website. Got there and place was closed.

name: Lori Hansen
text: Worst pizza establishment I have ever been to. Took 20 minutes to place my order and it wasn't even busy. Staff behind the counter were all speaking Spanish. Never greeted the customers. They kept putting my order behind others who came ‚Ä¶More

name: Bayley Perlmutter
text: Placed an order online and went in when it was supposed to be done and it took an hour longer than expected. Unbelievable

name: Alejandro Gutierrez Garcia
text: Always fast and effectively

name: Gary Bentley
text: I always get the build your own, Just the way I like it, and the crust is really good cooked all the way through.

name: G Sarver
text: Blaze pizza is a pretty well known chain in California. I‚Äôve been to the locations in SLO, Santa Maria and San Diego with great service . This location opened in the last year and is up to the standards of the others! ‚Ä¶More

name: Maria Eyles
text: Excellent food because you build it yourself! Service usually great though occasionally spotty. If you hit a good night, you get great fast service.

name: Trisha Meraz
text: Went to last night, a Monday night and I waited 40 minutes to give my order.  The employees were so busy talking to the teenagers in the store that they took their time making the pizzas, taking orders and paying.  I was so outraged, but I ‚Ä¶More

name: Linda Davis
text: One nite saw worker Ruth take money from customer, then went to make pizza and DID NOT take off rubber gloves used when touching money. Told her of her miss handling but she denied it. BAD health practice

name: StrafinJr
text: Had a decent experience, all the workers were in their own world, nobody even acknowledged my presence haha. Nobody was necesarily rude, just mean looks when I asked for more cheese or sauce, etc. They dont ask if you want any final ‚Ä¶More

name: Walter Paul
text: Solid experience, though I think the person behind the counter couldn't hear me, as I ended up repeating my order several times. Nevertheless, the pizza was good and as fast as I've come to expect from other Blaze locations.

name: brent christensen
text: Excellent service, thank you.

name: Olivia Webb
text: I eat here all the time (like once a week, no joke). I usually order through the app, which is fast and easy to use. I get the same thing every time (Red Vine with balsamic drizzle) and 99% of the time it's cooked to perfection. I've been ‚Ä¶More

name: Ro Gibson
text: The pesto dough knots were really great. Wasn't terribly hungry at lunch, 4 pieces was of ideal size. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jake Kadon
text: Easy cheap and fast. Great pizza and friendly staff

name: John Candido
text:
Place closes early
Night crew Supervisor needs to be written up for it

name: Matt Montague
text: Nobody knows what they're doing at this location... I placed an order right when I got there and waited 8 minutes for someone to start building the pizza and nobody ever came we end up walking out.... But the person who took our order in ‚Ä¶More

name: Pete Velazquez
text: It was one of the worst places I visit in a long timeüò†. They took forever to take our order and there was only like three people in front of me and it took 30minsüïú just to get to meüòµ. Once it was my turn they were so rude didnt apologize ‚Ä¶More

name: jasmyn ashworth
text: wow, this place is amazing! Very warm welcoming when you enter the restaurant , right off the bat very comforting. Food is great and served quickly! staff amazing. Very rare in these types of establishments.

name: Will Mincey
text: This is the best blaze I have ever had. Plus, either the owner or the manager was ready to help in every way.

name: Anne K
text: Denise and Elie were super friendly and helpful.  Great pizza too üëçüèª

name: Kayla Wamble
text:
Food is ok
Service is ok
Everyone looks miserable at their job. Not a single smile or how are you.

name: Paul Malarik Jr
text: Pizza Time! This new AG location is unbeatable! It is especially great between lunch & dinner. Then they have plenty of time to humor all your special requests on various toppings. Service is with a smile. With lots of toppings it is enough ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth Wyatt
text: I have had very good service, and the pizza is pretty good. Martin was my server today and I appreciated that he was helpful and friendly. The only small comment I would make, and it did not happen today, is I REALLY don't like the very loud WELCOME you hear upon entering.  It isnt genuine when you tell employees  to do it!

name: Chris Castaneda
text: Great pizza. I come here over the Santa Maria one and I live in SM. The pizza here just tastes better and well cooked. The staff is friendly as well and they don't act all stressed out and mess up your toppings like the SM Blaze.

name: Joe JV Vara
text: Stop by everyone said it was great , not. Original pizza with pepperoni and mushroom was fair at best. Donut pizza bread lacked flavor.  Mango drink horrible.

name: Jason Cooper
text: The staff greet me kindly, the food is constantly amazing. The pricing is fair. And the atmosphere is actually pretty good. You must try the blood orange lemonade!

name: Janelle Wahl
text: Service was horrendous we waited over 30 minutes to order. And the staff couldn't move slow enough no Smiles on their face no customer service and cringed every time more people got in line

name: Sarah Scobie
text: Always great pizza and friendly staff

name: Janell J.
text: Delicious and fresh. Worth it, even if there's a wait. You can't make fresh, fast!

name: Yo Ho
text: The pizza is okay. The service sucks. That trashy blonde chick chuanna is rude! Not to mention how uncomfortable she made the last time she made some flirty comments I've let roll off but now I'm starting to skip it after Kennedy. (Pizza after the gym WAS a treat)

name: Karisma Traughber
text: Was good but need a better heat source for to.go orders

name: Becky Wilber
text: Very cool vibe, friendly staff and great pizza with tons of options. Super fast service. Also doesn't break the bank. Highly recommend!

name: Luana Knowlton
text: Delicious pizza choices with a wide variety of fresh toppings, where you're the chef! Come early for shorter lines...

name: Ian Macleod
text: ROB HAS GREAT FRIENDLY ATTITUDE. And he made me the BEST pizza EVER.

name: Aaron Eriksson
text: Ordered online. The food was actually ready 40 minutes after it said it would be ready for pickup. People in the store waiting in line when I got there were served first. Wife and kids were kind of irritated.

name: Hudson Reynolds
text: Stood in the front of the line for 3 minutes while the full staff didn‚Äôt do or say anything. I wanted a BBQ chicken pizza with bacon and Onion. Instead they loaded it up with Gorgonzola and banana peppers, spoke only Spanish to me (I do not speak Spanish) and mumbled every possible thing.

name: Harvey Wood
text: Yes! Love this pizza. Build your own toppings. Thin crust brick fired done in 8 minutes or less.

name: Breanne Xo
text: It's like Subway but for pizza. Pizza is good but a little skimpy on the toppings!  The employees are nice and the place is clean.

name: William Azevedo
text: Fantastic quality and service. Even when busy they stay cool under pressure.

name: Tom Morrow
text: Love this " create your own" pizza place!

name: Gary Clatterbuck
text: Watch out..lunch prices end exactly 4:00 pm...

name: Ozone Landscape
text: Keep on driving unless you have 45mins to wait for a pizza. 1 person I front of me and 3 people working. Yet no one wanted to make a pizza. Come on guys get it together!!!!

name: jagjit Singh
text:
One of the best pizza shop in arroyo grande
good decent prices fast service
price is way much better than another pizza shop ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad
text: Build your own pizza as many toppings as you like for one low price

name: Taylor Dixon
text: My girlfriend is a blaze pizza connoisseur (she has to have a Red Vine at least twice a week), and this is her favorite location in SLO county. I like it because it‚Äôs new, clean, and the staff is extra friendly.

name: savannah taylor
text: I can't get ranch on top of my pizza because they refuse to put it on. They're ok.

name: Jeff J
text: Ate it up!

text: Very delicious

text: Love this place

text: love the pizza here
